Patient Particulars: Name: Kathy; Sex: Female; Marital status: Married
History: Present history: Patient had been trying to lose weight from a long time but due to her lack of focus and difficulty maintaining the motivation, her diet plan gets disrupted.
Current Mental Status Examination: Behavior: Patient was cooperative and rapport could be established; Mood: Calm; Affect: Broad; Insight: Grade 5
Issues discussed in Current Session: Patient expressed her lack of motivation in sustaining her weight loss plan. Her goal of losing 20pounds was broken down into smaller parts to make it more realistic and achievable.
Action Plan: Patient has to abstain from eating what she had planned not to by 7pm and in return, on successful completion, she will get to watch a TV show. She also has to maintain a record of this activity everyday to identify what can be the potential triggers or patterns that distract her.
